title: My script font critique
content:
Hi guys.

Im currently attempting to create a script font and these are the letters I have come up with so far.  
This the 4th font ive tried to create, but the others have been fairly simple display fonts.

![Smiley face](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182237im_/http:/oi62.tinypic.com/2ynqsf8.jpg)  
Im finding it difficult to make the connections, and in particular the letter r  
Any feedback or thoughts would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks.  
Josh.
